name: Wan J. Fokkink
content: Willem Jan Fokkink Wan Fokkink Professor of Theoretical Computer Science Research Interests: Protocol verification, supervisory control synthesis, distributed algorithms, concurrency theory Address: Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam Faculty of Science Department of Computer Science Section Theoretical Computer Science De Boelelaan 1111, 1081 HV Amsterdam, the Netherlands room: NU-12A59 in the NU building on the VU campus email: w.j.fokkink "apenstaartje" vu.nl One day per week I work at Eindhoven University of Technology, as Professor of Model-Based Systems Engineering in the Control Systems Technology Group in the Department of Mechanical Engineering (Pendulum building, room 2.07). Books Publications Presentations PhD students Supervised MSc and BSc theses Teaching Professional activities In the press Personal stuff
